title: Python for Data Analysis
summary: Python has long played a role in analyzing large scale data.  From tightly-knit super-computers running MPI-based applications to heterogeneous clusters woven together with scripts, Python has had a role to play in making it easier to processes data.  This tutorial will cover the tried and true techniques as well as introduce new trends.
